DataElement.preferredName: CCDI Study Arm Electronic Record Unique Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize digital data records related to specific treatment plans within a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research consortium established to: collect data from all childhood cancer cases, create a national strategy of appropriate clinical and molecular characterization to speed diagnosis and inform treatment for all types of childhood cancers, and develop a platform and tools to bring together clinical care and research data that will improve preventive measures, treatment, quality of life, and survivorship for childhood cancers.:A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._A collection of digital data that is managed and processed by a computer system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research consortium established to: collect data from all childhood cancer cases, create a national strategy of appropriate clinical and molecular characterization to speed diagnosis and inform treatment for all types of childhood cancers, and develop a platform and tools to bring together clinical care and research data that will improve preventive measures, treatment, quality of life, and survivorship for childhood cancers

Concepts.definition: A research consortium established to: collect data from all childhood cancer cases, create a national strategy of appropriate clinical and molecular characterization to speed diagnosis and inform treatment for all types of childhood cancers, and develop a platform and tools to bring together clinical care and research data that will improve preventive measures, treatment, quality of life, and survivorship for childhood cancers.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._A collection of digital data that is managed and processed by a computer system.

Concepts.definition: A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.
A collection of digital data that is managed and processed by a computer system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
